projects.name: Online Medical Consultancy Platform
projects.description: The project integrates a user-friendly interface with robust backend functionality, enabling seamless consultations between patients and healthcare professionals. Implemented features include real-time chat, appointment scheduling, and secure user authentication. Leveraged Django for backend development and React for a dynamic front-end experience, ensuring a responsive and efficient user experience.

projects.name: UrbanCart
projects.description: The platform provides a seamless shopping experience with functionalities including product browsing, shopping cart management, secure checkout, and user account management. Implemented dynamic product displays and real-time updates using React for the front end, and utilized Django to build a scalable and secure backend. Focused on creating an intuitive user interface and efficient data handling to enhance overall user satisfaction and operational efficiency.
